Articles.Content: Just wanting a simple modlet that allows a player to hit Shift+W to enable cruise control, and Shift+W to disable cruise control. Great for walking, and rovers.

Seems it would be easier to just get (worthwhile owning anyhow) a decent gaming keyboard or mouse.  Then make a macro that does this.  There are also third party macro tools that could do this without having any special hardware.

And, with rovers you can just use the trim function (Alt+W, Alt+X to reset) already in the game, bonus here is that you can actually prevent your rover from going too fast. Mechjeb has a rover autopilot function, don't know if it works in 1.1, but it did that one time I tried Mechjeb. There's also Kerbal Follower which gives you options for getting kerbals to follow (of course), and set them on patrols, which I figure if used right could get them walking across a sane distance.
I've used the MJ rover AP, the speed hold works ok. I'd not recommend the directional control without a lot of tuning but rovers don't seem to wander off course anyway.
